message: I'll take 99% and let you have the rest.  It's a fair starting point, wouldn't you say?
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Think carefully, time is literally money for me in this game.
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I'm not going to let you take the majority.  This is my final offer before I lose all my negotiating power.

Alice, this is getting ridiculous. The value is literally evaporating with each round. I'm taking a significant hit to inflation already, so I'm sticking with a 40/60 split in my favor.  Take it or leave it.
